text: Ani niscitapane amhi (adacya samudayala) te sakti-samarthya pradana kele hote, je tumhala dileca nahi ani amhi tyanna kana, dole ani hrdayehi de'una thevali hoti, parantu tyancya kannani, dolyanni ani hrdayanni tyanna kahica labha pohacavila nahi. Jevha te allahacya ayatinca inkara karu lagale ani jya gostici te thatta udavita asata, tica tyancyavara ulatali
